title: Zelenskyy warns world is on 'verge of nuclear disaster'; More explosions reported at Russian military sites
content:
1. Zelenskyy warns world is on 'verge of nuclear disaster'; More explosions reported at Russian military sites  CNBC
  2. Accusations fly between Ukraine and Russia over Europe's largest nuclear power plant. And the world frets.  CBS News
  3. Russian vehicles seen inside turbine hall at Ukraine nuclear plant  CNN
  4. Russia Threatens To Shut Down Major Nuclear Plant Amid Concerns Of Planned Incident  NBC News
  5. Ukraine warns Russia may cut Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant from power grid, both sides brace for 'provocation'  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Zelenskyy warns world is on 'verge of nuclear disaster'; More explosions reported at Russian military sites  CNBC
Accusations fly between Ukraine and Russia over Europe's largest nuclear power plant. And the world frets.  CBS News
Russian vehicles seen inside turbine hall at Ukraine nuclear plant  CNN
Russia Threatens To Shut Down Major Nuclear Plant Amid Concerns Of Planned Incident  NBC News
Ukraine warns Russia may cut Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant from power grid, both sides brace for 'provocation'  Fox News

localize.title: ゼレンスキー氏、世界は「核災害の危機に瀕している」と警告 ロシア軍施設での爆発をさらに報告
泽伦斯基警告说，世界正处于 "核灾难的边缘"；据报道，俄罗斯军事基地发生了更多的爆炸。
澤倫斯基警告說，世界正處於 "核災難的邊緣"；據報道，俄羅斯軍事基地發生了更多的爆炸。
